name: Wb Mail Logger
author: Web Builder 143

sections.description:
Wb Mail Logger will help to capture all WP emails. So this will help to debug email related issues. And also use full to store a copy of all sent emails.

Features

  • Bulk delete option
  • View attachments
  • View mail sent time
  • View mail sent status messages

Our other plugins

  • Custom Product Tabs For WooCommerce
  • Wb Sticky Notes
sections.installation:
1. In your WordPress admin panel, got to Plugins -> New Plugin, search for “Wb Mail Logger” and click install now.
  2. Activate the plugin
